text: Xiao Zhan is a Chinese artist and musician. He is best known for his hit single "Ling-a-ling-a-ling-a-ling" (Traditional Chinese:"Ring-a-ring-a-ring-a- ring."). He is also well known as a radical political sex and gender activist. He has advocated for what is known as "Zhanism," a social and political philosophy that states that the furtherment of Chinese international position, influence, and power, can only be attained by robust cultural sexual sponsorship domestically. He is also well known in China for his multi-copper selling mixtape "Feed Tha Streets" (Traditional Chinese:"喂饱街道"). Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese singers Category:Chinese television actors Category:Chinese movie actors
title: Xiao Zhan
